title: Get TRACK LAYOUT-belongs-to-race-track Relationship
description:
* The ›belongs-to-race-track‹ relationship for the selected TRACK LAYOUT is returned when one exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* The response contains the relationship ID, the relationship name and the relationship partner.
* An empty response is returned when the selected TRACK LAYOUT has no ›belongs-to-race-track‹ relationship. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a TRACK LAYOUT. -> Status Code \`404\`
